title: question about playing out of home
body:
Hi there,

I'm new to Melbourne and the lag drives me crazy. I'm considering about playing at a friend's home where NBN may provide me with better experience than ADSL2 does. Will that option lead to trouble as ip changes and get my account banned?{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Does your friend live nearby to you?
Does your friend also play league?

It's possible you may risk a suspension by doing this, but as long as you're not doing anything silly (ie; boosting) then you should be able to recover the account rather easily.
